short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Manage your job application status easily.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Stay organized and easily manage your job application as well as track your progress from start to finish in your job search journey.

View your job applications by category in a clean and intuitive interface.

Sort your applications into categories like Apply Later, Applied, Interview, Offered, and Rejection.

Save the dates for your interviews and get reminders as well.

Modify job status on the fly.
